title: Frozen Secrets
description: The wolf world of Elementa is divided among the packs. Interaction between wolves of different elements is strictly forbidden—and Aurora, a young Sky Wolf, wouldn’t have things any other way. Aurora is loyal to Queen Tempest and the rules she has set for her pack. But when Aurora accidentally encounters wolves from beyond her territory, she begins to question where her loyalties lie.Aurora embarks on a journey to unite Elementa, with the help of her unexpected new friends. However, they quickly learn that not everyone is willing to change their hearts. Will this adventure end up being a heroic quest, or a deadly mistake? Sink your fangs into this epic new series, and discover the world of Elementa!
author: Sophie Torro
